string-array.name: options_descriptions_for_list_view
string-array.item: Check and edit attendance by date
Learn how to use this app

string-array.name: help_options_title_for_list_view
string-array.item: How to check attendance of a specific date?
How to change attendance of a specific date?
How to check attendance of a particular student?

string-array.name: help_options_descriptions_for_list_view
string-array.item:
1.Type your class code to login in on the starting screen. If you have skip this step.
 2.Go to the "Take Attendance" option and click it.
 note:if you haven't added students then when you click on the "Take Attendance" option it will take you to the place where you can add students.
 3.A screen will come up where you can click on the box if the student is present or not click on the box if the student is absent.
 4.Click on save.
